column4: 5.04  help.   x starts ok the login screen comes up and accepts the ligin info. but gnome never starts.  all i get is a gray screen and a mouse curser ???
now how the crap do i start gnome ?
no startx gdm work just fine,  but no desktop
aha. hmm, and it's the first time it is trying to start gnome?
sorry. the thing I would normally try if it was an old install gone busted was to just rm -rf all the .gnome and .gtk stuff
that could work cause the /home was not clean.
that can easily become a problem when keeping your /home :P
added a user with clean /home lets see
hmm, then I would guess the network stuff would be the next way to go
kemik what in the network.... it is a single box with dialup ?
that wont last a reboot will it ?
no don't think so, but just to check ;)
